channel.title: Docs on Effective Shell
channel.description: Recent content in Docs on Effective Shell

item.description: In this chapter, we'll take a look at the various different types of shell commands that exist and how this can affect your work. By the end of this chapter, you might even be able to make sense of the horrifying and perfectly syntactically valid code below: which $(where $(what $(whence $(whereis who)))) What Are Commands? This is really important to understand! A command in a shell is something you execute.
